name: io.github.strato-space/media-gen-mcp
description: MCP server for OpenAI Images/Videos and Google GenAI (Veo) media generation.

environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key (required for OpenAI image/video tools).

environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Google GenAI API key for Veo video tools.

environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_GENAI_USE_VERTEXAI
environmentVariables.description: Set to true to use Vertex AI for Google GenAI.

environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT
environmentVariables.description: GCP project id for Vertex AI.

environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION
environmentVariables.description: GCP region for Vertex AI (e.g. us-central1).

environmentVariables.name: MEDIA_GEN_DIRS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated output directories for media files.

environmentVariables.name: MEDIA_GEN_URLS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated URL prefixes allowed for fetch tools.

environmentVariables.name: MEDIA_GEN_MCP_URL_PREFIXES
environmentVariables.description: Public URL prefixes for mapping local output files.

environmentVariables.name: MEDIA_GEN_MCP_TEST_SAMPLE_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Path to sample images for the test-images tool.
